text: Ole Gunnar Iversen (born 3 December 1968) is a retired Norwegian football midfielder. He came through the ranks of Kristiansund FK, moving to Trondheim and joining Strindheim IL in 1992. He played here throughout 1999. In 2003 he featured for lowly Nordlandet in his hometown, whereas in 2004 he became playing co-manager of Dahle IL together with former Strindheim teammate Stian Edvardsen. After two seasons there he managed Kristiansund BK for one year. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kristiansund Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Strindheim IL players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Norwegian football managers Category:Kristiansund BK managers
title: Ole Gunnar Iversen
